data.text: @OhGodWhatNowPod @VagrantJourno @Dorianlynskey @minnierahman @IanDunt @MrMichaelSpicer I know that it's been a really awful week, so thank you all for this. Harrowing and informative, and ending on a laugh. @minnierahman : even though I've never watched more than 2 in a row, I completely empathise with the satisfied, clean feeling afterwards. I get you. 🤗😁
